FastTrack/FastTrack/source/GlanceView.mc.description: GlanceView drawing logic follows FastTrackView.mc pattern: uses dc.setColor() for background/foreground, dc.clear(), dc.drawText() with responsive positioning using dc.getWidth()/dc.getHeight(). Status text at 1/3 height with FONT_MEDIUM, time at 2/3 height with FONT_NUMBER_MEDIUM.

FastTrack/FastTrack/source/FastTrackApp..description: GlanceView integration requires getGlanceView() method with :glance annotation in AppBase class. Method signature is 'function getGlanceView() as [GlanceView] or Null' and returns array containing GlanceView instance.
